tweet: 2/2 In July of 2017, I filed Articles of Impeachment based on #ObstructionOfJustice. See my legal basis in my op-ed in the HuffPost here: https://www.huffpost.com/entry/the-case-for-impeaching-donald-j-trump_b_59a5e4a3e4b08299d89d0a9b …

1/2 Today I voted for the #ImpeachmentResolution that lays the foundation for the next phase of the #ImpeachmentInquiry. The American people will hear how #Trump abused his power to pressure a foreign government to interfere in our elections. We must #DefendOurDemocracy

I am happy to report that the @HouseForeign passed both @RepKarenBass and @RepGraceMeng's bills promoting reunions between Americans and their relatives in #NorthKorea. I will continue advocating for the roughly 100,000 Americans who are divided from family in North Korea.

Historic day! The House overwhelmingly passes the #ArmenianGenocide Resolution. Great work by @RepAdamSchiff @FrankPallone @RepAnnaEshoo @RepEliotEngel @RepChrisSmith @SpeakerPelosi. And thanks to President #Erdogan -- we couldn't have done it without you.

After decades of struggle, the House of Representatives will finally recognize the #ArmenianGenocide. Today, I spoke on the House Floor to mark this monumental day. To watch, click below: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=15Mq5zLfyyo&feature=youtu.be …

On #NationalFirstRespondersDay, our brave first responders & firefighters are battling the #GettyFire to keep us safe. We continue to bear witness to their valor & poise whenever emergency strikes. Thank you to the first responders in our community and across the country.
https://abc7.com/getty-fire-evacuation-map-mandatory-orders-school-closures/5653001/ …

Today marks one year since the tragic shooting at the #TreeOfLife Synagogue. On this solemn anniversary, may we come together to honor those we lost while reaffirming our resolve to combat anti-semitism, bigotry and hate in all its forms.

Today, the House passed the #SHIELDAct to defend our democracy from foreign interference. In the face of threats we know are coming, we must take every necessary step to ensure that American elections are decided by Americans, not hostile foreign actors. pic.twitter.com/rXSGh2F9XJ

Today marks 4 years since the #AlisoCanyon gas blowout, the largest natural gas blowout in U.S. history. I continue to push for Aliso's closure and to ensure that SoCal Gas is held responsible for their actions. #ShutItAllDown. See here for more details: https://bit.ly/2BFIjyV

Today I confronted Mark Zuckerberg of over @facebook's plan to launch their own #cryptocurrency, the #Libra a.k.a. the #ZuckBuck. Watch the exchange here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-Au0F9VEAO4&feature=youtu.be …

I was deeply saddened to learn the news of @RepCummings passing. Elijah Cummings was a man of great conviction, strength and principle whose loss will be deeply felt throughout the country. My condolences to his family during this difficult time.

Fellow evacuees: we all have a lot to worry about. One bit of good news is that many homeowner’s insurance policies cover food and lodging for mandatory evacuees, even if no physical damage. So save receipts. #SaddleridgeFire
Thank you to @LAFD for protecting our homes. I was evacuated last night.

My "No Nuclear Weapon for Saudi Arabia" Act would require Congressional approval of any nuclear cooperation agreement with Saudi Arabia. This legislation ensures the Trump Administration can’t negotiate a bad deal that gives Saudi a future path to a nuclear bomb. 2/2

One year ago today, #JamalKhashoggi was murdered. Since then, President Trump has authorized the transfer of nuclear technical expertise to a regime that should not be trusted with a bone saw, let alone technology to develop a nuclear weapon. 1/2 https://wapo.st/2oINuLj

Today a federal court upheld the repeal of #NetNeutrality, but said the @FCC can't preempt state net neutrality laws. In 2017, my House colleagues & I stood up for an open internet, and today's mixed ruling ensures that this debate & fight will continue. https://nyti.ms/2nEPoMN

I would like to congratulate the people of the Republic of Cyprus on the 59th anniversary of #CyprusIndependenceDay. The relationship between the U.S & Cyprus is at an all time high as we work closely to expand commercial ties, develop natural resources, and promote stability.
